PAL.NAME: Microsoft Lync Server 2013 - Mediation
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Microsoft Lync Server 2013 Mediation Server.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:MediationServer - Media Relay - Candidates Missing
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of times Media stack does not have Media relay candidates.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:MediationServer - Media Relay - Media Connectivity Check Failure
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:MediationServer - Media Relay\- Media Connectivity Check Failure
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of media connectivity check failures.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:MediationServer - Media Relay\- Media Connectivity Check Failure
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:MediationServer - Media Relay\- Media Connectivity Check Failure

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:MediationServer - Media Relay\- Media Connectivity Check Failure
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:MediationServer - Media Relay\- Media Connectivity Check Failure

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:MediationServer - Health Indices - Load Call Failure Index
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:MediationServer - Health Indices\- Load Call Failure Index

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:MediationServer - Health Indices\- Load Call Failure Index
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:MediationServer - Health Indices\- Load Call Failure Index

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:MediationServer - Health Indices\- Load Call Failure Index
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:MediationServer - Health Indices\- Load Call Failure Index

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Scaled index between zero and 100 that is related to all call failures due to heavy load

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:MediationServer - Global Counters - Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:MediationServer - Global Counters\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:MediationServer - Global Counters\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:MediationServer - Global Counters\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:MediationServer - Global Counters\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:MediationServer - Global Counters\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy

THRESHOLD.NAME: Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from the Proxy >= 10

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of calls that failed because of unexpected interaction from the Proxy

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:MediationServer - Global Per Gateway Counters - Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:MediationServer - Global Per Gateway Counters(*)\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:MediationServer - Global Per Gateway Counters(*)\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:MediationServer - Global Per Gateway Counters(*)\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:MediationServer - Global Per Gateway Counters(*)\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:MediationServer - Global Per Gateway Counters(*)\- Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway

THRESHOLD.NAME: Total failed calls caused by unexpected interaction from a gateway >= 10

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of calls that failed because of unexpected interaction from a gateway
